utilizing the shell utility

	


	

		
status checks

		
Checks are started simultaneously, unless "--simultaneous no"

	
		
The structure

		
			/_status
				status_1.py			
		
	
		
write "status_1.py"

		
# status_1.py

def check_1 ():
	print ("check 1")
	
def check_2 ():
	print ("check 2")
	
def check_3 ():
	raise Exception ("not 110%")

checks = {
	"check 1": check_1,
	"check 2": check_2,
	"check 3": check_3
}
		
					
		
		
from the "_status" directory

		
[xonsh @ _status] Titaness status
